channel.title: How to make client have my ip
channel.description: i have nullpkz client and source iand i would like to use the client so i can see all customs etc. but i dont know how to make it get the ip. if anyone could help me ill give rep. im not sure if u do that on this fourm if u do then i would like to give rep.

item.title: How to make client have my ip
item.dc:creator: @Runes_Are_Cool Runes Are Cool?
item.description:
@Runes_Are_Cool wrote:

GUI.java, client.java server.java, and server.

item.title: How to make client have my ip
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

baddy351:

i have nullpkz client and source iand i would like to use the client so i can see all customs etc. but i dont know how to make it get the ip. if anyone could help me ill give rep. im not sure if u do that on this fourm if u do then i would like to give rep.

Nullpkz is a leech of my server. :…

@Topic: In my client’s GUI.java, search “Epicarrowscapev2” (and in client.java + EGUI.java) or “Nullpkz”, if he bothered to change it before releasing ._."

Change it to 127.0.0.1 for localhost (unportforwarded, only you can connect)
or just edit it to your server’s, and run the server + client, then login.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make client have my ip
